From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Epyon::

He took a few hits, and swung his saber at DarkFate at an angle that
would cut his head off.

::DrillBit::

He hit the ground.
"I didn't become a Predacon. I was brough on line as one. And that
doesn't mean I cant have honor and respect. Not all Predacons live up to
that reputation you Maximals give us."
He got up and turned shooting off rounds from his gattaling gun. He
could not miss at this range.(Depth Charge must be close because he
kicked DB. So the shots should cause some heavy damage.)
